name: nerd
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, especially a man, who is not attractive and is awkward or socially embarrassing: He was a real nerd in high school - I can't believe he's so handsome now.
a person who is extremely interested in one subject, especially computers, and knows a lot of facts about it: I'm a real grammar nerd.
